about_the_game:
Venture into the chilling depths of a forgotten island steeped in royal history turned nightmarish nightmare in this gripping first-person survival psychological horror game. As a lone forest keeper, you find yourself marooned on an island with a sinister past—a once serene vacation haven of a king and his family, now home to the restless souls they've become.

Your journey begins in the warmth of summer, and your quest will carry you through the changing seasons, from tranquil autumn to the bone-chilling depths of winter. The island teems with enigmatic wildlife, cryptic notes revealing its dark history, and essential pickups to aid your survival. Illuminate the treacherous darkness with your trusty lantern as you face the terrors that await.

With both day and night and the ever-present shift in seasons, the line between reality and nightmare blurs. Adapt, strategize, and fight for your life against the horrifying creatures spawned by the scientist's dark experimentation.

Are you ready to become the "Forest Keeper" and confront the chilling horrors that lurk beneath the surface of this enigmatic island? Prepare for a heart-pounding, psychological horror experience like no other, complete with controller support to immerse yourself in this terrifying world.

content_descriptors.notes:
Mature Content Warning:

In this survival horror game, players will encounter intense and graphic depictions of violence, blood, and frightening monsters throughout their journey. The game features visceral combat against these creatures, often resulting in graphic injuries and gore.

While there are no depictions of sexual acts, nudity, drugs, or alcohol in the game, players should be aware that the game's storyline may touch upon sensitive topics such as psychological horror, intense fear, and themes of survival in dire circumstances.

Additionally, while sexual assault and non-consensual sex are not depicted, the game may contain themes of psychological distress and trauma that some players may find disturbing.

Overall, players should exercise caution and discretion, as the game's content is intended for mature audiences who are comfortable with intense violence and horror themes.

detailed_description:
Venture into the chilling depths of a forgotten island steeped in royal history turned nightmarish nightmare in this gripping first-person survival psychological horror game. As a lone forest keeper, you find yourself marooned on an island with a sinister past—a once serene vacation haven of a king and his family, now home to the restless souls they've become.

Your journey begins in the warmth of summer, and your quest will carry you through the changing seasons, from tranquil autumn to the bone-chilling depths of winter. The island teems with enigmatic wildlife, cryptic notes revealing its dark history, and essential pickups to aid your survival. Illuminate the treacherous darkness with your trusty lantern as you face the terrors that await.

With both day and night and the ever-present shift in seasons, the line between reality and nightmare blurs. Adapt, strategize, and fight for your life against the horrifying creatures spawned by the scientist's dark experimentation.

Are you ready to become the "Forest Keeper" and confront the chilling horrors that lurk beneath the surface of this enigmatic island? Prepare for a heart-pounding, psychological horror experience like no other, complete with controller support to immerse yourself in this terrifying world.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit only
  • Processor: 2.6GHz CPU Dual Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU recommended with 4 GB video memory
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+ (64-bit only)
  • Processor: 2013 or newer Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia or AMD GPU with 4GB Memory
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Dedicated graphics card required

name: Forest Keeper

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I5-8400 or AMD RYZEN 3 3300X
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB or AMD Radeon RX 570 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD (Preferred)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I7-8700K or AMD RYZEN 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 or AMD Radeon RX 5700.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD (Preferred)

short_description: Survival Horror set on a sinister island. As a lone forest keeper, you'll unravel its grim secrets from the eerie backstory of a royal vacation home turned nightmare. Journey through the changing seasons, from day to night. Confront nightmarish abominations that emerge in the winter cold.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
